scripts.build: rimraf ./dist && mkdir ./dist && rustup default stable && cargo build --release -p transform_swc_plugin --target wasm32-wasip1 && cp ../../target/wasm32-wasip1/release/transform_swc_plugin.wasm ./dist/transform_swc_plugin.wasm
scripts.build:debug: rimraf ./dist && mkdir ./dist && cargo build -p transform_swc_plugin --target wasm32-wasip1 && cp ../../target/wasm32-wasip1/debug/transform_swc_plugin.wasm ./dist/transform_swc_plugin.wasm
scripts.?build-release: When https://github.com/atlassian/changesets/issues/432 has a solution we can remove this trick
scripts.build-release: npm run build && rimraf ./_release && yarn pack && mkdir ./_release && tar zxvf ./package.tgz --directory ./_release && rm ./package.tgz
